text: Ramón Barraza (born 20 October 1996) is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a forward for Primera B Nacional side Atlético de Rafaela. ==Career== Barraza was originally with San Cristobal de Santa Fe. Barraza's senior career started in 2016 with Argentine Primera División side Atlético de Rafaela, he made his first-team debut on 2 June 2016 against Ferro Carril Oeste in the Copa Argentina. Barraza didn't make another appearance in the 2016 or 2016–17 seasons; Rafaela were relegated at the end of the latter campaign. ==Career statistics== . {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |+ Club statistics |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|CupIncludes the Copa Argentina. !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="3"|Atlético de Rafaela |2016 |rowspan="2"|Primera División |0||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0||1||0 |- |2016–17 |0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0||0||0 |- |2017–18 |rowspan="1"|Primera B Nacional |0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0||0||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !0!!0!!1!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!0!!0!!1!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Santa Fe, Argentina Category:Argentine footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Argentine Primera División players Category:Primera B Nacional players Category:Atlético de Rafaela footballers
